last_episode_to_air.name: Ernie Hudson
last_episode_to_air.overview: Actor Ernie Hudson returns to the remote mountain lodge in Arizona where he and his family encountered a terrifying supernatural force; Kim Russo uncovers the dark history of the lodge.

name: The Haunting Of...
overview: "The Haunting Of..." is an original series featuring world-renowned psychic-medium Kim Russo as she gives an exclusive look at celebrities who have had their lives changed by paranormal events. Each one-hour episode of "The Haunting Of..."

episodes.name: Beverley Mitchell
episodes.overview: Beverley Mitchell ("7th Heaven") returns to Pennhurst Asylum to find answers about the ghosts at Pennhurst. Kim and Beverley go on a shocking and dangerous journey through the abandoned institution.

episodes.name: Eric Mabius
episodes.overview: For the first time in years, Eric Mabius (Resident Evil, Ugly Betty) returns to Allaire Village to confront the ghost he saw when he was a child. Eric and Kim explore Allaire Village and uncover secrets from the past.

episodes.name: Connie Stevens
episodes.overview: Connie and her daughter Joely Fisher have shared their home with a ghost for a long time. Kim accompanies both women as she uncovers secrets about the house and its former owner, revealing surprising visits from the other side along the way.

episodes.name: Kelly Carlson
episodes.overview: Kelly ("Nip/Tuck", "The Marine") returns to her childhood home in Bloomington, MN where she has been tormented by ghosts her whole life. Kim Russo accompanies her on this journey and explains why Kelly has attracted these spirits and how she can learn to control these traumatic encounters in the future.

episodes.name: Regis Philbin
episodes.overview: Regis ("Who Wants to be a Millionaire", "Live with Regis and Kelly") returns to the Whaley House to find out why a ghost appeared to him and why she left so suddenly. Regis and Kim explore one of the most haunted places in America.

episodes.name: Chazz Palminteri
episodes.overview: Chazz ("The Usual Suspects", "A Bronx Tale") returns to the Bronx restaurant where he had a paranormal encounter with profound implications. Kim and Chazz find out why the ghost contacted him and other messages he has to deliver.

episodes.name: Michael Rapaport
episodes.overview: Michael Rapaport ("Boston Public", "Prison Break") and a long time friend revisit Erasmus High School where dead students once haunted them. Kim communicates with the spirits at the school to relay answers to Michael's questions.

episodes.name: Gina Gershon
episodes.overview: Gina ("Face/Off", "Bound") and Kim revisit Gina's old apartment from her days as a student at NYU. Kim and Gina explore the apartment building and discover spirits who met gruesome and untimely deaths.

episodes.name: Fairuza Balk
episodes.overview: After having a traumatizing experience at her studio, Fairuza ("American History X", "The Craft") wants to know more about the ghosts that live there. Kim Russo meets with Fairuza to find out what exactly is going on and what the spirits want to communicate.

episodes.name: Barry Bostwick
episodes.overview: Actor Barry Bostwick and Kim Russo journey to Rockland County, NY, where they visit an old farmhouse where Barry experienced paranormal activity as a youth with his family, and he takes on the entity to find out what happened.

episodes.name: Elisabeth Rohm
episodes.overview: Elisabeth Rohm visits her former residence in Southampton, N.Y.

episodes.name: Nadine Velazquez
episodes.overview: Nadine Velazquez visits two of her childhood homes in Chicago.

episodes.name: Giancarlo Esposito
episodes.overview: Giancarlo Esposito visits one of his former homes in Ridgefield, Conn.

episodes.name: Rowdy Roddy Piper
episodes.overview: Roddy Piper encounters ghosts in his Portland, Ore., house.

episodes.name: Jay Thomas
episodes.overview: Jay Thomas visits his former home in Santa Barbara, Cal., in the Season 2 finale.

episodes.name: Charles Shaughnessy
episodes.overview: Charles Shaughnessy (The Nanny / Days of Our Lives) stands up to his boyhood fears and returns to a legendary 16th century English castle where he had a supernatural experience as a child. With the help of Kim Russo, Charles is forced to confront the evil, shadowy spirit that dwells in the castle and bullies its visitors.

episodes.name: Carnie Wilson
episodes.overview: Carnie Wilson travels to Weed, California where a ghostly visit traumatized her years ago. With the help of Kim Russo, Carnie journeys through her past to find out why this ghostly encounter happened and uncovers a shocking secret.

episodes.name: Patrick Muldoon
episodes.overview: Patrick Muldoon (Melrose Place, Starship Troopers) faces his worst fears when he revisits an Inn in Charleston, SC, where he was once attacked by an evil entity.

episodes.name: Sally Struthers
episodes.overview: Sally Struthers shared her former home in Brentwood, CA with a ghost for many years. Traumatized by the experience, Sally returns with Kim in the hopes to uncover the secrets behind the restless soul(s) that still inhabit the house.

episodes.name: Kim Carnes
episodes.overview: Singer Kim Carnes returns to a farmhouse in Franklin, Tenn., where she once met a childlike spirit.

episodes.name: D.B. Sweeney
episodes.overview: D.B. Sweeney returns to a haunted motel in Fort Bragg, Cal., where he once encountered an evil entity.

episodes.name: Kristen Renton
episodes.overview: Kristen Renton goes ghost hunting aboard the Queen Mary.

episodes.name: Tito Ortiz
episodes.overview: MMA star Tito Ortiz visits his former home in Hollywood, which he believes to be haunted, along with psychic medium Kim Russo.

episodes.name: Bernie Kopell
episodes.overview: Bernie Kopell visits a hotel in Niagara Falls, N.Y., where he once encountered a bloody ghost.

episodes.name: Jack Blades
episodes.overview: Musician Jack Blades returns to a home in New Mexico where he encountered spirits nine years earlier.

episodes.name: Coco Austin
episodes.overview: Model Coco Austin returns to her former New Mexico home where she was tormented by a dark entity.

episodes.name: Shirley Jones
episodes.overview: Shirley Jones revisits her former home in upstate New York where she was chased out of the house by spirits.

episodes.name: Pennhurst Asylum Revisited
episodes.overview: Kim believes an entity from her visit to Pennhurst Insane Asylum has been following her. She returns to Pennhurst to determine who this unseen force is, what they want and try to release it before Kim and her family are put in danger.

episodes.name: Vanessa Williams
episodes.overview: Kim visits Vanessa Williams at her home in Westchester, N.Y.; Kim realizes that a spirit has a negative hold on Vanessa.

episodes.name: Vince Neil
episodes.overview: Vince Neil returns to the home where he last saw the spirit of his daughter; Kim discovers that Vince is being followed by a dark entity.

episodes.name: Brett Cullen
episodes.overview: Brett Cullen returns to his former residence in Richmond where he encountered traumatic paranormal events

episodes.name: Wayne Newton
episodes.overview: Singer Wayne Newton visits the Las Vegas theatre where he encountered the ghost of his friend; psychic medium Kim Russo is filled with emotion as she prepares for the journey with Wayne.

episodes.name: Dot Jones
episodes.overview: Actor Joe Pantoliano returns to the Santa Fe hotel where he and his girlfriend had a paranormal experience; Joe and Kim Russo explore the haunted hallways of the hotel.

episodes.name: Lou Gossett Jr.
episodes.overview: Louis Gossett Jr. feels nervous as he returns to the Louisiana hotel where he was once surrounded by some angry ghosts.

episodes.name: Jesse Metcalfe
episodes.overview: Actor Jesse Metcalfe returns to his childhood home in Connecticut where he and his family had paranormal experiences.

episodes.name: Greg Grunberg
episodes.overview: Actor Greg Grunberg.

episodes.name: Tatum O'Neal
episodes.overview: Tatum O'Neal revisits a Brooklyn townhouse where she had a life-changing paranormal experience.

episodes.name: Richard Burgi
episodes.overview: Actor Richard Burgi revisits his childhood home in New Jersey where he encountered the paranormal.

episodes.name: Jordan Ladd
episodes.overview: Actress Jordan Ladd returns to an old mansion in New Jersey where she once encountered a ghost that was watching her sleep. With psychic medium Kim Russo by her side, they confront the troubled spirit who has a clear message for Jordan.

episodes.name: Johnny Weir
episodes.overview: Olympic figure skater Johnny Weir visits an ominous brick building in Pennsylvania that has frightened him since his childhood.

episodes.name: Diane Farr
episodes.overview: Actress Diane Farr fears a ghost is causing unexplained havoc in her California home. Kim Russo investigates and discovers the truth is far more unimaginable than either of them could have thought.

episodes.name: Loni Love
episodes.overview: Loni Love returns to the hotel in North Carolina where she once suffered a scary experience.

episodes.name: Lou Gossett Jr.
episodes.overview: Louis Gossett Jr. feels nervous as he returns to the Louisiana hotel where he was once surrounded by some angry ghosts.

episodes.name: Kesha
episodes.overview: Singer Kesha revisits the bed and breakfast where she encountered a paranormal apparition; Kim Russo uncovers the bed and breakfast's shocking history.

episodes.name: Ernie Hudson
episodes.overview: Actor Ernie Hudson returns to the remote mountain lodge in Arizona where he and his family encountered a terrifying supernatural force; Kim Russo uncovers the dark history of the lodge.
